TextBody:
Hello,

As a first step, please let us know the epp server version (as seen from the lower right corner from epp server UI), epp client version and OS type & version you are currently using.
Custom notifications can be created from server UI > System Parameters - Device Types and Notifications.
If you are referring to notifications pertaining to content aware policies, you can choose to disable user notifications from inside the policy if you'd like that.

Thank you and Best regards,
Alin
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BhcIF:ref
Subject: Unwanted alerts    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BhcIF:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BhcIF:ref

I actually thought I disabled all notifications - however this is for Device control - but in our UAT - the user had a popup for a BT Mouse saying it wasn't allowed but was working anyway.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #411606 - Unwanted alerts

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BhcIF:ref

We would like an alert on an action like File Copy yes.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #411606 - Unwanted alerts

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BhcIF:ref

however only when it's a forbidden activity.  User tried to write to USB but its not allowed against policy - the project team would like to have a pop up to use  a form in our service now for access.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #411606 - Unwanted alerts

TextBody:
HI Sanjay,

Please let me know your timezone and availability for a remote connection using Zoom for today or tomorrow.

Best Regards,
Alin.
